title: Marbury v Madison decides constitutionality of law

content.prompt: In <u>Marburv</u> v. <u>Madison</u> (1803), the Supreme Court assumed the power to

choices.label: decide whether internal congressional procedures are constitutional
advise Congress on the constitutionality of a proposed law
decide on the constitutionality of a law or an executive action

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of required Supreme Court cases.
